sections.title: Welcome to Magazine Builder
sections.subtitle: Create beautiful magazines with ease
sections.bodyMarkdown:
# Getting Started

This is your first section. Edit the content, add images, and customize the layout to create your perfect magazine.

## Key Features

- Rich text editing with Markdown
- Image management and AI generation
- Color palette customization
- Professional print-ready output
